email_sequence.subject: LDPI, INC. vs digital-native competitors
email_sequence.body:
Hi Terri,

I see LDPI, INC. still relies on PDF catalogs. Companies with manual distribution typically experience:

- Price updates taking 3-5 days to reach reps
- Conflicting quotes from outdated sheets
- Reps working from wrong info constantly

Is this creating headaches for your team?

email_sequence.subject: How Globalux Lighting eliminated your exact problem
email_sequence.body:
Hey Terri,

Globalux Lighting had LDPI, INC.'s exact problem:

"Mobile failures devastate trade show performance"

Their transformation:
• Order time: 4 hours → 15 minutes
• Error rate: 30% → <1%
• Real-time mobile ordering at trade shows
• 47-day payback period

Proven across $2.3M customer portfolio.

Want their implementation playbook?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: 3 companies solved LDPI, INC.'s exact challenges
email_sequence.body:
Hey Terri,

3 companies solved LDPI, INC.'s challenges:

• Butler Specialty: 300% rep productivity increase
• Godinger Silver: "Best thing in 25 years"
• Wildwood Lamps: 33% fewer support calls

All report 25-40% productivity increases within 90 days.

12-minute video showing their results?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: $750,000 impact for LDPI, INC.
email_sequence.body:
Hey Terri,

LDPI, INC.'s current inefficiencies:

• Productivity loss: $300,000/year
• Error costs: $262,500/year  
• Trade show waste: $187,500/year
• Total impact: $750,000/year

Investment: $20K/year
Payback: 47 days (validated across 15 customers)
5-Year ROI: 187x

Want your custom ROI model? Takes 15 minutes.

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: 3 competitors just passed LDPI, INC.
email_sequence.body:
Hey Terri,

While LDPI, INC. uses manual processes, 3 direct competitors digitized in 2024:

• Universal Furniture: 25% sales increase
• Theodore Alexander: 40% faster quotes  
• Butler Specialty: 300% rep productivity

Your competitors are 40% faster. Quote time: Them (minutes) vs You (hours).

Should we discuss closing this gap before High Point Market?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: Quick question about Avanti Press's trade show process
email_sequence.body:
Hi Carolyn,

Noticed Avanti Press doesn't have mobile catalog access. When we see this, it usually means:

- Trade show orders written on paper, entered later
- Reps can't quote without calling the office
- Show leads lost to slow follow-up

Sound familiar? Or have you found workarounds?

email_sequence.subject: How Pebl Furniture eliminated your exact problem
email_sequence.body:
Hey Carolyn,

Pebl Furniture had Avanti Press's exact problem:

"Manual catalog navigation killing productivity"

Their transformation:
• Order time: 4 hours → 15 minutes
• Error rate: 30% → <1%
• Eliminated 3 hours daily per rep waste
• 47-day payback period

Proven across $2.3M customer portfolio.

Want their implementation playbook?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: 3 companies solved Avanti Press's exact challenges
email_sequence.body:
Hey Carolyn,

3 companies solved Avanti Press's challenges:

• Butler Specialty: 300% rep productivity increase
• Godinger Silver: "Best thing in 25 years"
• Wildwood Lamps: 33% fewer support calls

All report 25-40% productivity increases within 90 days.

12-minute video showing their results?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: $750,000 impact for Avanti Press
email_sequence.body:
Hey Carolyn,

Avanti Press's current inefficiencies:

• Productivity loss: $300,000/year
• Error costs: $262,500/year  
• Trade show waste: $187,500/year
• Total impact: $750,000/year

Investment: $20K/year
Payback: 47 days (validated across 15 customers)
5-Year ROI: 187x

Want your custom ROI model? Takes 15 minutes.

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.body:
Hey Carolyn,

While Avanti Press uses manual processes, 3 direct competitors digitized in 2024:

• Universal Furniture: 25% sales increase

• Butler Specialty: 300% rep productivity

Your competitors are 40% faster. Quote time: Them (minutes) vs You (hours).

Should we discuss closing this gap before High Point Market?

Best,
[Your Name]
